website_summaries.verdict: If you need to be able to transport your trike, this lightweight, folding model is the best option.
pros: Much lighter than competitors, and the folding mechanism is easy to use
Its size makes it a good choice for teens or adults
Features front brake with a parking brake
cons: Assembly may be difficult and instructions are unclear

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited when i received the box. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when i received the box. I end up taking it to the mechanic across the street due to the chain and I was charged $100.00 getting this damn tricycle together. The chain was so crooked that he had to take it apart. In addition, the handle bar is rusty. He told me to go to Home Depot and buy a wax for metal to prevent more rust. In addition, there's so many scratches!!! I could have just return this but because of the "folding tricycle" I didn't want to bother taking it apart and shipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: ONLINE SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: I love the bike
customer_reviews.text: Im on my second bike. First one was making some kind of clicking noise, since the box it came in was was all broken so i figure bike must be damaged. So I returned my first and replce with the second one. After few 2 weeks of riding, now my bike is making the same clicking noise. I love the bike! Finally got my bike all set up to ride my two Yorkies. The noise has not bother me yet
customer_reviews.author: linh recco

customer_reviews.title: Unusable because of defect now it says I can't return it all because I have to work and didn't have time to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: Unless I can find a way to remove the huge weld burr on the axle where the wheel attaches, it is unusable. I was swamped at work and didn't get it put together until Easter Sunday. Now I look on her to return it and it says my return window closed March 31. This is not right
customer_reviews.author: sandieclaus

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROURS BIKE DO NOT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Horrible I almost go kill because thia bike see video
customer_reviews.author: claudio cassinelli

customer_reviews.title: ... this bike for my 20 year old daughter with poor balance and its perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bike for my 20 year old daughter with poor balance and its perfect. We had local bike shop assemble and were warned that folding isn't as easy as advertised, but outside of that, it is as expected and perfect for her. Sturdy, basket a great addition. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted this to help him get outside a little better (he has a hard time walking but can still ...
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dad wanted this to help him get outside a little better (he has a hard time walking but can still drive, etc and this seemed more fun than a wheelchair), and so far he's really happy and excited about it (he just got it yesterday and put it together in a couple hours by himself). So I would give 5 stars however the seat arrived with a rip in it. After a quick google search I can't find the company information to find out what I can do about it. I would love a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: P&E Design Co

customer_reviews.title: But hole lined up but it looks like and old used bike not a new one
customer_reviews.text: as other reviews stated bike arrived with scratched and badly dented chain guard also front fender was dented in several places. But hole lined up but it looks like and old used bike not a new one. We are going to beach tomorrow so I can not return it. Save your money and get one that is better quality I never give bad reviews but do not buy this one
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE this cute tricycle. I got this for my dad and he's so happy. This is a bit smaller than the tricyles you'd see at a bike store however that doesn't make it bad. If anything I like the compact size and look. Folding isn't that easy, but it isn't that hard either. My dad who's 81 can't fold it on his own. That's not a problem for us though. He just get helps when he needs to put it away.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great way to ride a bike!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Bike a week early! Came in well packaged and my husband assembled with the help of our 6 y.o. Despite many reviews about difficult assembly part it turned out very easy. I guess you simply follow instructions or ask someone who has a bike to help you. I been riding for couple of days now and took it to Cape Cod to ride on the trail- received many complements and :"I need bike like this, where did you get yours?" All parts seem to be sturdy. I will post an update later as well, in anything crucial brakes
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: Great trike for exercise and shopping!
customer_reviews.text: Great trike for my mother-in law. Had back pain but loves riding this trike. Really likes being mobile! I assembled the trike using proper torque and locktite as appropriate. I didn’t want a pedal to loosen or the rear basket to fall off. My in law rides for recreation and shopping at least twice a day, for up to an hour each trip. She says she hasn’t felt this great in years. I couldn’t believe her smile when I first saw her riding around the block.
customer_reviews.author: R McBride

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I had this bike assembled at a nearby bike shop! My gf loved it! It's not heavy at all and it came in a relatively small box...I even had to ask the UPS guy if there was another piece to be delivered.. lol
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Tires are garbage
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this doesn't get a 5 star is because of the tires. I love the trike but the tires are garbage. I got 4 flat tires within 24 hrs. I replaced the tube 4 times. With the high price of this trike, the seller should include good reliable tires. Other than that I love the trike
customer_reviews.author: Urijah

customer_reviews.title: great option for a special needs child
customer_reviews.text: This bike was a wonderful choice for my 11 y o child with autism and significant motor delays. It gives her stability to practice pedaling while coordinating that with steering. I can comfortably run along side her to provide support. It was a bear to assemble and some aspects of manufacturing (fenders) are a bit cheap. The assembly instructions are generic for all bikes, not specific to this one, so they weren't helpful at all. The folding mechanism provides a slightly more compact frame so that I am able to fit the bike into the back of my small SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: That said it is perfect for what I bought it for which is to ...
customer_reviews.text: I probably would not have purchased this trike if I had seen it first simple because I live in a city with a bunch of steep hills. There is only one hand brake. I would cruise around my neighbor if it had foot brakes. That said it is perfect for what I bought it for which is to tool around camp grounds with my little dog.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi H

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Some parts didn't fit on bike. Sorry I didn't take pictures, but I was frustaded after I finished assembling the trike. I rented the same kind of bike when I was on vacation, so I thought this will be the nicest thing to have at home. First bad experience on amazon. I hope this will be the last bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. Estela

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, but it works
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. I feel a little squished. Like it is not omg enough from front to back. But it is sturdy and I can ride it. I am 270lbs right now and a regular bike just won’t do. It’s great to finally get to ride again.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Great trike
customer_reviews.text: Great trike and love the way it folds for easier transportation/ storage. It came damaged and missing hardware, but after emailing the company they delivered missing items and replacements right away. My son loves it and we all take turns riding it. Basket is great for extra items you want to haul around on your rides. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: juke owner

customer_reviews.title: This is more of a toy than a usable bike ...
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a toy than a usable bike for an elder person. It needs more than one gear. The reflectors are relatively important but can't mount them on the bike. The bike maintenance manual seems to have no relation to the trike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My 89 year old father loves his new bike. We got the shorter one so he was closer to the ground and able to put his feet flat on the ground. He put it together by himself and did have to look on YouTube when it came to attaching the brake cables but he did it! And the folding mechanism is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it folds easily and fits in my SUV. I take it whever I want to go. Have received compliments on its beautiful deep blue color. You will need a metric Allen wrench to adjust breaks. Made some minor adjustments as well. Was satisfied that my questions were answered by the BIKE AID technician. Very helpful. Their number is 1-877-245-3243.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Great bike was about to order a second one but the price went up by about 40.00
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bike. It is not as easy to fold as I thought it would be. Very lightweight and solid. Came back to buy a second one and they raised the price by about 40.00 since I took delivery of this bike one day ago. Interesting since the FULL retail price is what I paid 389.00. Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: electrlux

customer_reviews.title: Typical made in China garbage
customer_reviews.text: Made in China piece of crap. Screws and bolts strewn throughout the box. A cap on the front fork is actually missing. Overpaid by 100 bucks at least. Spend the money and get the quality one by Worksman. This is a knock off of that one and is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the money but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for the money but difficult to assemble. What made matter worse was that the box had the wrong assembly manual - it was for the single speed bike. I had to reference online sources to figure out how to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty bike. Was missing one wheel nut.
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks great. It was pretty easy to set up, but the instructions are pretty useless if you don't have basic understanding of how to adjust or maintain a bicycle. The bike came on time, but was missing one nut, so I am still unable to secure one wheel until I make it to a bike shop. Pretty frustrating. I turned my home upside down trying to find something to replace the nut with.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not very excited. At first it came all scratched ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very excited. At first it came all scratched. The hassle with send it back was too big so we kept it. Now when spring approaches we finished to put it together. It is hard to tighten the bolts . hand bar is loose as well as the seat :( We know it was inexpensive , but we will have to buy more screws to try it to use . Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike well built i got it for my wife and she loves it. But the fender was broke durning shipping i called customer service talked to some great people they had me a new fender in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Carter

customer_reviews.title: Squirrelly
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service & pretty easy assembly. Trike looked good but very difficult to steer over any dips or bumps in fact I fell over sideways. Too squirrelly for me
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Tires won’t hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike but the tires won’t hold air! Once around the block and the tires are almost flat!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Awful assembly and cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: This trike was a gift for my mother who loves to ride but stability was becoming a issue. She enjoys the bike and that's what matters but..... The instructions to assemble were AWFUL! Nothing was clear. After several hours, I watched a video on YouTube to assemble it. Also, plastic screws, foot pedals, very thin and bendable aluminum parts made it feel very cheap. There are higher quality bikes out there at a better price. Save your money and don't buy this bike.
customer_reviews.author: diane barbour

customer_reviews.title: Good bike.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needed to go to the dealer to get it out together. Then it jumped the chain a couple times until we figured out how to realign the back wheels after transportation. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Groovyguy

customer_reviews.title: Love my new wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike, but I had to get help to assemble...was missing a couple of bolts and washers...never heard back from seller, so I bought them locally.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced Bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my wife. It has been a very pathetic Headache from the word get go. I'm giving it away. Will never buy another bike from this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: most unprofessionally built ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: i chose this Trike for the advertised versatility being foldable and 6 speed, but was very disappointed to see how poorly this bike was built and sloppy packaging. had to return , cannot be fixed , even though the company offered a replacement of parts , i do not trust the product. i expected better from amazon....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My mom absolutely loved it, we'r gave it to her for her birthday this weekend and she was in heaven
customer_reviews.author: roberta lujan

customer_reviews.title: The Trike was defective but I did not want to return because of time spent assembling it
customer_reviews.text: I put the adult tricycle together for my wife and walked behind her noticing that one of the back wheels was very unbalanced! I took it to a nearby bike shop to get it straightened out and they still have it! They said it will not be ready until Friday. I would like to be reimbursed for the cost of the repair. Please tell me where to send the bill?
customer_reviews.author: tmcphail57

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the bike, very comfortable and easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as i had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Brakes not too good, not as sturdy as I would have hoped
customer_reviews.author: Bobber

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and instructions are terrible
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are awful. Packaging was terrible. Front fender had a huge dent in it. Main sprocket was bent causing the chain to fall off constantly. We made it work but not without significant adjustments. Thankfully my son loves the bike, but I wish we would have considered other models.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Winner

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bike
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bike. I'm dyslexic and have had balancing issue my whole like and when my mom took my trike away and replaced it with a two wheeler that was when i stopped bike riding. NOW I'm back and loving it. My only issue with this bike is it's bulky and doesn't fold the way i had hoped it did from the description. As you can see from my pics I've used it on weekend & LOVED every minute. For anyone whose not ridden a bike because of balancing issues this bike is awesome:):)
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but we were able to enjoy it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality, but we were able to enjoy it for 1 time ride. I hope it will serve us in a long run...
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this tri 😉
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yrs old son w autism loves it. There was a few screws missing & the baskets holes didn’t match w the holes in the frame but we made it work. Super stable & easy to ride, light weight & easy to fold. Very cute. The only problem is that if turning going a bit fast it tends to flip over But otherwise perfect for my son.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: much better instructions, and the nuts and bolts literally need ...
customer_reviews.text: Some parts were missing, issues with stripped nuts and bolts - namely the left pedal and handle bar (my husband replaced the nut and bolt) and the instructions were a total nightmare. We literally had to look a the photo on Amazon to figure out how certain things were connected. I'm not a fan of the pivotal seat, but I can live with that. Basically, you get what you pay for. What this bike needs is more quality control, much better instructions, and the nuts and bolts literally need to be of better quality. Would I recommend it? No. Spend a little more and get a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike..easy to put together rides great are using at my work, very good bike for the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike !!!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old autistic son has been riding this for few weeks and it is very easy to handle and turn unlike the regular bikes that gives us hard time to control the ride when someone riding on it. He loves to ride it to his school everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Great retirement trike
customer_reviews.text: Great retirement trike, I can save my energy and enjoy the ride I get to see more also when I stop thanks a million
customer_reviews.author: The scooter man Turtleman bike man

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It will do get me from one place to the next
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Ride

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like is that i didn't receive the white wall tires that were advertised on the bike and one of the tires had a damage (bad gash ) had to purchase a new tire at a local bike shop.
customer_reviews.author: Mario M.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The bike was cheaply made. It’s not big enough for a full size adult.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt bjerga

customer_reviews.title: Horrible direction and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: So the bike itself is awesome. Putting it together is a pain in the butt. The direction are so bad that we ended up using the picture off amazon to put it together. Then the breaks were so messed up we took it to a bike shop and had them fix it right. The bell was missing and some of the reflectors were missing as well. The bike will last a long time with proper care. I am glad I got this bike, but I highly suggest taking it to a bike shop and having them Put it together for you, if you don't have any idea how to put a bike together.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy and not that good of quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Bielskis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!! Should have listened to the comments!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What no screws at all? Really? I would have given a minus to this if I could have. And customer service is closed. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage bike
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap materials and terrible instructions. Took me hours to figure it out only to not be able to get the last pedal on. We promptly sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun Tricycle! The whole household uses it especially those ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Fun Tricycle! The whole household uses it especially those who dont know how to balance and ride a 2 wheeled Bike! LOL! The quality is good and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Black Sun

customer_reviews.title: I like the tricycle but it is harder to ride than ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the tricycle but it is harder to ride than I thought. I wish it had gears so it would make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P.

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, but basket brackets were not installed correctly.
customer_reviews.text: One of the brackets on the back for the basket is facing the wrong way. Since this is welded on, I will have to take it to someone to fix it so the basket can be mounted.
customer_reviews.author: R. Servis

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Would have sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Would have sent it back, but husband threw the box away and can't find a box big enough to put it in. I am very disappointed in bike. The handles won't stay in place, no matter how you tighten everything, won't stay, will not fold up like it is supposed to and when it came had scratches on the fender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ride It Before You Buy It! Not Comfortable. Not Designed Well.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this trike.I bought this trike and had a bike shop put it together. This trike is very uncomfortable to ride because it is not designed well. It is wobbly and cheap. Not a fun experience. I rode it for a week and sent it back. I then found and bought Sun Seeker EZ-TriClassic SX which I absolutely love. I want to shout from the rooftop about how much I love it. It does not fold up for travel though. I ride it around my neighborhood and rent one when we are on vacation. I strongly recommend you go to a bike rental place and ride on some before you purchase off the internet. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Wild Raspberry Designs

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BIKE which is good for handicapped elderly riders
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike. My husband and I are handicapped we feel safe on this bike. Only draw back is it's only hand brakes. The company Cycle Force Group is the best. They know their product. They make you feel very comfortable asking questions. If I ever need anything I'll go to them. This bike has reflectors on the shelf and on the basket.
customer_reviews.author: KWright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it; but no manual and no fender came with it
customer_reviews.author: Medhen M.

customer_reviews.title: Looking for that fun ride.
customer_reviews.text: I paid to have it assembled and it wasn't cheap in S.F. I was surprise that I had to lower the back seat of my Volvo to get it in and it wasn't easy. The seat, because I'm short and my legs are short, is unable to secure tightly. It swivels because the neck is all the way down. It is a little heavy for a lady to be lifting in and out of a truck or whatever vehicle you have that it will fit. I have to ride it more to appreciate or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Scott

customer_reviews.title: They were great to work with
customer_reviews.text: They were great to work with. One part was bent and the company immediately sent out a replacement part. Love the bike and my daughter loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bike. My 8 year old son who has autism rides this with so much ease. Unlike other reviewers, the assembly was not a major issue. My husband and older son put the trike together with no real issues at all. That said, they are very technically oriented and could have had an advantage from that perspective. In a nutshell, this is a great trike. Would give 6 stars if i could because it has opened a whole new world to my son.
customer_reviews.author: RudoC

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of crap, missing parts and the instructions must have been ...
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap, missing parts and the instructions must have been written a 2 year - old. Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.author: Rick Pippin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son who is Autistic he seems to like it, however,...Bike has a few parts missing, the instruction my husband said where not the greatest either. The handlebar feels a little wired to use...maybe something to get used to riding a tricycle, who knows?.
customer_reviews.author: Hanh Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: has promise
customer_reviews.text: riding on angled surfaces takes practice, 1 speed only, but a smooth cruising ride, lots of complements, prefer brake on right, have carried loads of grocery, did also a small air conditioner , slight balance issues but made it safe, still testing.....would not put people in basket ..
customer_reviews.author: Nice&Slow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't fold as narrow as I hoped, only folds down
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: CAME WITH BACK WHEEL BAR BENT, COULD NOT RIDE THE BIKE STRAIGHT FORWARD, WOULD TURN AND GO TO THE LEFT OR RIGHT INTO THE MUD OR OFF THE ROAD. VERY DANGEROUS. THE BOX WAS A MESS THAT IT CAME IN, SO I HAD TO LOOK FOR A BIG ENOUGH BOX TO SEND IT BACK IN..... VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Mayrie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Folding up to fit...
customer_reviews.text: Love the folding feature!!! It makes it easier to put under my RV in storage..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 9-year-old daughter. She is special ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9-year-old daughter. She is special needs. She absolutely loves this bike! I bought this one for the folding aspect, but I haven't tried putting in the back of my QX60 yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mariellen

customer_reviews.title: good for light duty use
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for my disabled step daughter. Because it has smaller wheels than other brands it is more stable and easier for her to handle. The bike is quite a bit lighter weight than others on the market also which is good for our needs even though it does seem to be less sturdy. It does not fold down very smal but it is handy for transporting it in the back of our suv that it folds a little bit. The instructions for putting it together are terrible!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: it great and helps with my exercising a lot
customer_reviews.text: The three wheel bike, it great and helps with my exercising a lot. It is easy to ride and the battery pack is great help, when something happens. Thanks for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed due to the lack of proper instrucion to emsamble it, and the chain adjustment is lowsy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Jorge

product_meta.title: Tri-Rad Adult Unisex Folding Tricycle, 20 or 24 Inch Wheels in 3 Colors
feature_bullets: Frame/Fork: Folding steel frame with steel suspension fork. Age Range- 12 years and Up
Wheels/Tires: Aluminum rim with 20 X 1.75 inch white wall Kenda tires
Drivetrain: Single speed, one piece crank. Front alloy linear pull brake with parking brake
Brakes/Cockpit: Front V-brake with parking brake, easy adjust steel stem, large comfort saddle
Includes: Front fender, rear basket, parking brake, bell, chainguard. Folded dimensions of 35"L x 30"W x 31"D

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
